description:
Get ready to head out into the great American outdoors with Push Gaming's Bison Battle machine. Take on the buffalo of the grand canyon and fight your way through the Sioux and Cheyenne to win the big prize!

Wild coyotes, golden eagles, terrifying lynx and various bison will be your allies on this journey through the mountains of the arid and dry desert.

Enjoy the 2 valleys when triggering FreeSpins: Ice Park Feature and Green Valley Feature. You can also touch the specific feature of this game: Bison Battle.

When 2 sticky bisons meet, they merge and offer you a winnings directly credited to your account!
awardsText:
The return to players of this game is 96.41%. Bison battle is a high volatility machine.

The game is in 5*4 format and consists of connecting at least 3 symbols and 20 paylines are available.

You can bet on this machine from 0.10cts to â‚¬100 per betting round or by using the Auto feature, to set up to 100 rounds.
feature1Text: The blue and green buffalo are scatter symbols, which can only be present on the first line. You will need a red buffalo on the same line to trigger the FreeSpins.
feature2Text:
These symbols can only land on the 1 and 5 wheel.
When these two bisons meet, they merge and offer a win equal to the multiplier on the symbol. If they don't connect, the symbol passes the reels one by one for an even greater chance of winning a prize. It disappears after 5 spins.
feature3Text:
This symbol substitutes for all other symbols except the Red, Green and Blue Bison.
During the Green Valley feature this sticky wild is only valid for wheels 2, 3 and 4.
feature4Text: You will be entitled to 3 spins in the Ice Park feature. Every time a symbol appears, you'll get 3 spins. If a buffalo lands on one side, the multiplier will work on all multipliers in the line!
feature5Text: All the Wilds in Green Valley are sticky Wilds. You will have 8 FreeSpins to multiply them for a huge payout. The sticky wilds are only present on reels 2, 3 and 4.
comment: This game is in demo version, to play for real money click here
